title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 607.3 - Clearance requirements of subsurface telephone facilities constructed to replace existing facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 607.3 - Clearance requirements of subsurface telephone facilities constructed to replace existing facilities

State Regulations

Whenever subsurface telephone facilities are replaced for
any reason, the new facilities shall be constructed in accordance with section
607.2
of this Part, to the extent
reasonable and economically practicable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
607.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
